title: WATCH: DF Malan's incredible cheer is still going viral
text:
WATCH: DF Malan's incredible cheer is still going viral

A video of DF Malan's 2019 MTBS cheer has gone viral and it's easy to see why.

DF Malan High School is well-known for their breathtaking cheers at sports events, and this year's annually held interschool competition between DF Malan, Tygerberg, Belville and Stellenberg High Schools (MTBS), was no exception.

A video of the school's 2019 immaculate performance has gone viral, and it's easy to see why.

DF Malan shared first place with Belville High School at the 2019 MTBS.

Watch the perfectly coordinated performance here:

See their other amazing cheers here:

description: A video of DF Malan's 2019 MTBS cheer has gone viral and it's easy to see why.
